oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE ROLE OF IN-FLIGHT MAGAZINES IN PUBLIC RELATIONS: THE CASE OF TURKISH AIRLINE COMPANIES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Caber, Meltem
Öztürk, Seray
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: In-flight Magazines
Aviation Sector
Public Relations
Image
Loyalty
Content Analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study aims to investigate the use of in-flight magazines with the purpose of public relations (PR) in aviation sector which is an ignored area of research in tourism and travel literature. With this purpose, six image- and six loyalty-generating PR themes were firstly derived from a literature review. Following, in the case of four Turkish airline companies, in-flight magazines are content analyzed, which are published in 2017. The results showed that the most commonly used image-generating PR sub-theme was the ‘news about the company’, in general.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: e-Review of Tourism Research; Vol. 17 No. 6 (2020); 921-933
